content.query:
SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://adltaxi.dfs.core.windows.net/nytaxi/raw/taxi_zone.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        header_row = true,
        FIELDTERMINATOR=',',
        ROWTERMINATOR='\n'  
    ) AS [result]


-- or 
SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'abfss://nytaxi@adltaxi.dfs.core.windows.net/raw/taxi_zone.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        header_row = true,
        FIELDTERMINATOR=',',
        ROWTERMINATOR='\n'        
    ) AS [result]
